API Collection# Music Instrument Audio Unit Subtypes

## [Topics](/documentation/audiotoolbox/1619498-music-instrument-audio-unit-subt#topics)

### [Constants](/documentation/audiotoolbox/1619498-music-instrument-audio-unit-subt#Constants)

[`var kAudioUnitSubType_DLSSynth: UInt32`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/kaudiounitsubtype_dlssynth)A multitimbral instrument unit that can use sample banks in either DLS or SoundFont formats.[`var kAudioUnitSubType_MIDISynth: UInt32`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/kaudiounitsubtype_midisynth-3su2x)[`var kAudioUnitSubType_MIDISynth: UInt32`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/kaudiounitsubtype_midisynth-7sqwb)[`var kAudioUnitSubType_Sampler: UInt32`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/kaudiounitsubtype_sampler-9nhfl)A monotimbral instrument unit that functions a sampler-synthesizer and supports full interactive editing of its state.[`var kAudioUnitSubType_Sampler: UInt32`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/kaudiounitsubtype_sampler-1sys8)## [See Also](/documentation/audiotoolbox/1619498-music-instrument-audio-unit-subt#see-also)

### [Enumerations](/documentation/audiotoolbox/1619498-music-instrument-audio-unit-subt#Enumerations)

[Music Track Properties](/documentation/audiotoolbox/1515456-music-track-properties)Properties for music tracks.[`struct MusicSequenceFileFlags`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/musicsequencefileflags)Flags that configure the behavior of the [`MusicSequenceFileCreate(_:_:_:_:_:)`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/musicsequencefilecreate(_:_:_:_:_:)) and [`MusicSequenceFileCreateData(_:_:_:_:_:)`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/musicsequencefilecreatedata(_:_:_:_:_:)) functions.[`enum MusicSequenceFileTypeID`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/musicsequencefiletypeid)The various types of files that can be parsed by a music sequence.[`struct MusicSequenceLoadFlags`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/musicsequenceloadflags)Flags used to configure the behavior of the [`MusicSequenceFileLoad(_:_:_:_:)`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/musicsequencefileload(_:_:_:_:)) and [`MusicSequenceFileLoadData(_:_:_:_:)`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/musicsequencefileloaddata(_:_:_:_:)) functions.[`enum MusicSequenceType`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/musicsequencetype)The various types of music sequences.[Music Extended Control Event Type](/documentation/audiotoolbox/1515446-music-extended-control-event-typ)[Music Player Errors](/documentation/audiotoolbox/1515472-music-player-errors)[Music Event Types](/documentation/audiotoolbox/1515479-music-event-types)[Music Note Events](/documentation/audiotoolbox/1473494-music-note-events)[Music Device Selectors](/documentation/audiotoolbox/1473469-music-device-selectors)[Music Device Properties](/documentation/audiotoolbox/1533931-music-device-properties)[Music Device Sample Frame Mask](/documentation/audiotoolbox/1533978-music-device-sample-frame-mask)[Music Device Unit Properties](/documentation/audiotoolbox/1533963-music-device-unit-properties)[Instrument Types](/documentation/audiotoolbox/1534202-instrument-types)[Music Device Generic Properties](/documentation/audiotoolbox/1533930-music-device-generic-properties)
